title: 1 bed- washer and dryer and private entrance!
neighborhood: 643 Dorchester Drive, Suite 225 Rochester Hills, MI
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Nestled in idyllic Rochester Hills, Oaks at Hampton beckons with a glimpse of apartment living as you’ve never imagined.', 'Feel at ease with our highly rated Rochester schools nearby and Troy’s vibrant business and technology corridor five miles away.', 'Our place in the prestigious Hampton Planned Community offers all the best of Rochester Hills, right at your front door.', 'Upgraded kitchen cabinets, new wood-style flooring and silver appliances twinkle with a fresh, eye-catching sheen.', 'A lap pool stretches into the distance as a golf ball, hit just right, soars into the air at the Hampton Golf Course down the street.', 'Elevate your space.', 'Settle into Oaks at Hampton Apartments, and experience apartment living the way it should be.', 'Our one bedroom, one bathroom upper level apartment, has its own private entry!', "With just 15 stairs up, you'll enter your apartment with high ceilings and private balcony.", 'Each apartment also has in unit, stack-able washer and dryer.', 'The bedroom has a spacious walk in closet, also, a nice storage closet!', "Our kitchens comes with a stove/oven combination, refrigerator, dishwasher and let's not forget about the garbage disposal!", 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 5, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'DEPOSIT & FEES:$300 non-refundable fee(plus an additional $100 fee for puppies under 1 year of age) --PET RENT:$40/month per pet(per pet, 2 max allowed)', 'Deposit:', 'Leasing options:', 'Leasing notes:',
